name: Angular Momentum
description:
Angular Momentum

A game loosely based on xkcd #162, for the 2017 xkcd game jam.

Art

Helmet image based on https://openclipart.org/detail/176334/space-helmet, everything else I made myself using GIMP.

Code

Built with Processing. Source on github.

Music

Made with Beepbox.

Sounds

Made with BFXR.
